name: Single Stroke Roll
instructions: Play alternating R-L-R-L strokes. Start slowly and focus on even spacing and consistent volume between hands.

name: Double Stroke Roll
instructions: Play RR-LL-RR-LL. Focus on making the second stroke in each hand bounce naturally.

name: Paradiddle
instructions: Play R-L-R-R, then L-R-L-L. The double stroke should flow smoothly after the alternating strokes.

name: Flam
instructions: Play a grace note followed immediately by the main stroke with the opposite hand.

name: Basic Rock Beat
instructions: Kick on 1 and 3, snare on 2 and 4, hi-hat on all quarter notes.

name: Rock Beat with Hi-Hat Foot
description: Adding hi-hat foot to basic rock beat
instructions: Play basic rock beat while adding hi-hat foot on the & of 2 and & of 4.

name: Power Rock Beat
instructions: Kick on 1, 2+, 4. Snare on 2, 4. Hi-hat eighth notes.

name: Jazz Swing Pattern
instructions: Play triplet-based ride cymbal pattern with swing feel. Emphasize beats 1 and 3.

name: Comping Pattern
description: Left hand and bass drum accompaniment
instructions: Practice various snare and kick combinations while maintaining steady ride cymbal.

name: Bossa Nova
instructions: Light kick pattern with cross-stick snare and subtle hi-hat work.

name: Samba
instructions: Syncopated kick and snare pattern with driving hi-hat.

name: Linear Funk Pattern
instructions: Create groove where kick, snare, and hi-hat never play at the same time.

name: Ghost Note Groove
description: Subtle snare hits between main beats
instructions: Add quiet snare hits between accented snare beats for texture.

name: Basic Tom Fill
instructions: Move around the toms in a simple pattern, ending with crash on beat 1.

name: Linear Fill
instructions: Create fill where only one limb plays at a time, maintaining clear separation.
